Changes
=======

0.1.2 (2014-08-01)
------------------

The signature of the **foreach** decorator unified with the signature
of the **paramseq** constructor.

Testing/documentation-related updates and improvements.

0.1.1 (2014-07-29)
------------------

Minor testing/documentation-related improvements.

0.1.0 (2014-07-29)
------------------

Initial release.
